author: Joesff

text:
I think it's more because the 8-bit era was dominated by the big Japanese developers. I still think Nintendo (as an example) have some of the best music in their games (always have done and always will do).

Whereas this generation, Western developers are more prominent, and without hating on them, I just don't think they can create music as good as some of the best Japanese developers.
